body_html:
I hope there could be a mechanism for people inside and outside Google to know what each other is working on... at least for the open source part of Tensorflow.

Yeah, this is disappointing for me, too.

I'm not sure what we should do to avoid this in the future -- @hawkinsp, do you have any thoughts? Should I announce a big change like this on our internal TF mailing list so people know we're working on it? I guess I figured this code hadn't been reworked in so long, the chances were small that we'd midair like this...

body:
> I hope there could be a mechanism for people inside and outside Google to know what each other is working on... at least for the open source part of Tensorflow.

Yeah, this is disappointing for me, too.

I'm not sure what we should do to avoid this in the future -- @hawkinsp, do you have any thoughts?  Should I announce a big change like this on our internal TF mailing list so people know we're working on it?  I guess I figured this code hadn't been reworked in so long, the chances were small that we'd midair like this...
